title: Shimoneta to Iu Gainen ga Sonzai Shinai Taikutsu na Sekai
synopsis: With the introduction of strict new morality laws, Japan has become a nation cleansed of all that is obscene and impure. By monitoring citizens using special devices worn around their necks, authorities have taken extreme measures to ensure that society remains chaste.
